::FireBlade::
Feeling the poison he had only one thing left to do.  His SGL pointed
toward the snake biting him and pumped three Fire grenades at him that
would explode on contact spreading his patented liquid fire
everywhere. "I will be able to take the heat snake...you will not.."
he gurgled out finding it harder and harder to act.
